dict.acceptation: 热情，热忱；热衷的事物；宗教的狂热；

sent.orig: The enthusiasm to study in China is the twin of the enthusiasm for Chinese.
sent.trans: 与“中文热”同时出现的就是“中国留学热”。

sent.orig: Good department wind can make everybody pleasurable be inspired enthusiasm, in the job with full enthusiasm.
sent.trans: 良好的系风可以使大家心情舒畅、精神振奋，以饱满的热情投入到工作中。

sent.orig: Each of them had plenty to say and their faces were flushed with enthusiasm.
sent.trans: 她们各人有许多话，她们的脸一致通红。

sent.orig: He is always overflown with enthusiasm.
In later years, the press book shrunk in size -- and enthusiasm.
sent.trans: 在以后的几年，pressbook缩水-和热情。
